messages.content: What is the main purpose of the comfyui-lmstudio-image-to-text-node?
The main purpose of the comfyui-lmstudio-image-to-text-node is to generate text descriptions of images using LM Studio's vision models within the ComfyUI framework.
What are the two main functionalities provided by the LM Studio Nodes extension for ComfyUI?

The LM Studio Nodes extension for ComfyUI provides two main functionalities: 1) Image to Text: Generate text descriptions of images using vision models, and 2) Text Generation: Generate text based on a given prompt using language models.
What is the default system prompt for the LM Studio Image To Text Node?
The default system prompt for the LM Studio Image To Text Node is: 'This is a chat between a user and an assistant. The assistant is helping the user to describe an image.'
Which input is required for the LM Studio Image To Text Node?
The 'image' input is required for the LM Studio Image To Text Node. It is the input image to be described.
What is the default value for the 'model' parameter in the LM Studio Image To Text Node?
The default value for the 'model' parameter in the LM Studio Image To Text Node is: 'billborkowski/llava-NousResearch_Nous-Hermes-2-Vision-GGUF'.
What is the default IP address and port for the LM Studio server in the LM Studio Nodes?
The default IP address for the LM Studio server in the LM Studio Nodes is 'localhost', and the default port is 1234.
How can you enable debug mode in the LM Studio Nodes?
To enable debug mode in the LM Studio Nodes, set the 'debug' input to 'True'.
What is the output of the LM Studio Text Generation Node?
The output of the LM Studio Text Generation Node is the 'Generated Text', which is the text generated based on the input prompt.
